'''That's What [[Bilbo Baggins]] Hates''' is a song from the [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|1977 adaptation]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]''
column2: the lyrics are based on [[Chip the glasses and crack the plates|the poem from the book]]. The lyrics were adapted by [[Jules Bass]] and the music by [[Maury Laws]]. ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' features [[Blunt the Knives|a similar adaptation]] of the poem.
